## How to configure certificate for a course?

John is the course manager in an organisation, and he wants to configure a
certificate for a course so that learners will receive this certificate after
they get the Pass course grade. Let’s see how John will enable certification
and configure the certificate for a course.

1\. In Curricula, John clicks **Course** on the left navigation pane, and
finds his course.

2\. John clicks the **Configure** button and navigate to **Configure
settings**.

3\. He turns on the **Certificate** toggle.

4\. John downloads the template, customise the certificate body, and then
browses the file to preview.

***Note** : When customising the certificate body, John can add some
references to the file just like the template. The inserted references will be
replaced with the actual data when learners receive the certificate.
